[Y]Mini Project
[W]Build a one-screen dodge game.
[c][m.]
[W]Implement movement, hazards, score and
[W]lives before adding polish.
[W]Ship a complete tiny game, then
[W]iterate from feedback.
[c][m.]
[G]- Core loop first.
[G]- Collision second.
[G]- Polish last.
[m][m-]
[Y]GOAL
[C]Completion creates confidence.
[c][m.]
[C]0 MAIN   [W]# HELP
